verses.verse: <S%H1419>Great<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised,<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

<S%H3303>Beautiful<s%> in <S%H5131>elevation,<s%> the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth,<s%> is <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3411>sides,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4428>King.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3045>shown<s%> himself in her <S%H759>citadels<s%> as a <S%H4869>refuge.<s%>
<S%H4428>For,<s%> behold, the kings <S%H3259>assembled<s%> <S%H5674>themselves,<s%> they passed by <S%H3162>together.<s%>
They <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8539>it,<s%> then they were amazed. They were <S%H926>dismayed.<s%> They hurried <S%H2648>away.<s%>
<S%H7461>Trembling<s%> took <S%H270>hold<s%> of them <S%H2427>there,<s%> pain, as of a woman in <S%H3205>travail.<s%>

As we have <S%H8085>heard,<s%> so we have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3559>establish<s%> it <S%H5769>forever.<s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
We have <S%H1819>thought<s%> about your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of your <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

As is your <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> so is your <S%H8416>praise<s%> to the <S%H7099>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> Your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>
Let <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> be <S%H1523>glad!<s%> Let the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice,<s%> Because of your <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>
<S%H7896>Mark<s%> <S%H3820>well<s%> her <S%H2430>bulwarks.<s%> <S%H6448>Consider<s%> her <S%H759>palaces,<s%> that you may <S%H5608>tell<s%> it to the <S%H314>next<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>
For this <S%H430>God<s%> is our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever.<s%> He will be our <S%H5090>guide<s%> even to <S%H4192>death.<s%>
